name: Lijeski et al., Appellants, v. Shapp

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManderINO, JJ.
parties: Lijeski et al., Appellants, v. Shapp.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Justin Blewitt, Jr., Deputy Attorney General, with him J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Lijeski et al., Appellants, v. Shapp.
Argued September 25, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManderINO, JJ.
Larry P. Gartens, for appellants.
J. Justin Blewitt, Jr., Deputy Attorney General, with him J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellees.
November 17, 1972:
